name: Dropping Doll (Male) Blueprint
description: No matter how long the adventure journey you've travelled, don't forget your beginner's mind. Doll made by the cute girls of Kafra company in memory of this moment and to show the warmth and concern. (Although it's a boy-style doll, girls can wear it too.)

name: Dropping Marionette
description: Doll made according to the look of popular monster Marionette. It makes your head feel cool.

name: Dropping Marionette Blueprint
description: Doll made according to the look of popular monster Marionette. It makes your head feel cool.

name: Dropping Marionette [1]
description: Doll made according to the look of popular monster Marionette. It makes your head feel cool.

name: Drops Candy
description: A candy in the shape of Drops, with a burning taste. Within 1 minute, the earth damage you suffer will reduce by 100%. This effect cannot stack up with other Poring candies, and is not influenced by death. This item can only be used on PVP maps.

name: Dry Material Chest
description: A well-preserved wooden box. The shell is dry and seemingly the box has been sealed for years.

name: Duff's Cape
description: A cloak that does not cover people well.

name: Duff's Cape [1]
description: An ordinary-looking cloak, only the user can feel its specialty.

name: Duff's Shoes
description: The boots used by Dover, the forger, a very strong prop.

name: Durandal Shadow
description: The previous name of the sword was "Durandal" and then renamed as the sword of "Mysteltainn" as its master was a god slayer and the sword is filled with the blood of many gods. The sword bears the power of Durandal, which however has been sealed by the evil power of "Mysteltainn". The owner of the sword is disappeared. It’s only a phantom of the true sword and can be used by Durandal’s progeny.

name: Durandal Shadow
description: The previous name of the sword was "Durandal" and then renamed as the sword of "Mysteltainn" as its master was a god slayer and the sword is filled with the blood of many gods. The sword bears the power of Durandal, which however has been sealed by the evil power of "Mysteltainn". The owner of the sword is disappeared. It's only a phantom of the true sword and can be used by Durandal's progeny. (Better used as the weapon skin)

name: Dusk Veil
description: Magical veil Pixie used to cover their face, protect users from the windy weather of Yggdrasil and also add a feel of mystical grace.

name: Dwarf King's Axe
description: Dwarven Warlord Dann's portable battle axe, along with his numerous thrilling wars, symbolizes dwarven tenacity.
